title: Isolate Terms with $$x$$
text: The first step in solving is to move all the terms without an $$x$$ to one side of the equation.

title: Equation after Division
text: What is the right hand side of the equation once the $$6$$ is subtracted from both sides of the equation?

title: Inverse of Natural Log
text: The inverse of the natural log ln is to exponentiate by e.

title: Exponent
text: Taking the exponent of both sides turns the right hand side of the equation into the new exponent of e.
